request.prompt: A red vintage convertible car from the 1960s
request.region_description: the blue sedan in the center of the image

text: I've replaced the blue sedan with a beautiful red vintage convertible from the 1960s, maintaining the same perspective and lighting as the original scene.

request.prompt: A modern glass entrance with automatic sliding doors and contemporary lighting
request.region_description: the old wooden front door of the building

text: I've modernized the entrance with sleek glass doors and contemporary lighting while maintaining the architectural integrity of the building.

request.prompt: A beautiful Japanese maple tree with red autumn foliage
request.region_description: the bare patch of ground in the garden foreground

text: I've added a stunning Japanese maple with vibrant red autumn leaves to enhance the garden landscape while respecting the existing composition.

request.prompt: A modern abstract painting with bold geometric shapes in blue and gold
request.region_description: the empty wall space above the sofa

text: I've added a sophisticated abstract painting that complements the room's color scheme and adds visual interest to the space above the sofa.

request.prompt: Continue the mountain landscape with more peaks and a valley below, maintaining the same golden hour lighting and atmospheric perspective

text: I've extended the landscape to reveal more mountain peaks and a dramatic valley, maintaining the beautiful golden hour lighting and atmospheric depth.

request.prompt: Extend the building facade to show more of the street context with additional buildings and urban environment

text: I've expanded the view to show more of the urban streetscape, revealing neighboring buildings and creating a fuller architectural context.

request.prompt: Extend upward to show more dramatic sky with clouds and atmospheric effects

text: I've extended the sky to reveal dramatic cloud formations and enhanced atmospheric effects that complement the existing composition.

request.prompt: Create a wider panoramic view by extending in all directions to show the complete scene context

text: I've created a panoramic view that reveals the complete environmental context, showing how this scene fits into the larger landscape.
I've applied Van Gogh's distinctive post-impressionist style with bold, swirling brushstrokes and vibrant colors while preserving the original composition and subject matter.
I've transformed the image into anime/manga style with characteristic large eyes, stylized features, and vibrant colors typical of Japanese animation.
I've applied a beautiful watercolor painting effect with soft color bleeds, transparent layers, and the characteristic flow of watercolor medium.
I've transformed the image into modern digital art style with clean vector-like aesthetics, bold colors, and contemporary digital illustration techniques.

custom_style_reference.description: Using a reference image to apply custom artistic style

text: I've applied the artistic style from the reference image, incorporating its color palette, brushwork, and aesthetic qualities while maintaining the original subject matter.

selective_inpainting.description: Modify only specific objects or regions while leaving the rest unchanged
use_cases: Replacing specific objects in complex scenes
Changing clothing or accessories on people
best_practices: Match the style of surrounding elements

contextual_outpainting.description: Extend images while maintaining visual and contextual consistency
use_cases: Creating panoramic views from single images
best_practices: Maintain consistent lighting across the extension
Ensure natural continuation of patterns and textures

artistic_reinterpretation.description: Transform images through various artistic styles and techniques
use_cases: Producing artistic interpretations for creative projects

inpaint_then_outpaint.description: First modify specific regions, then extend the overall composition
inpaint_then_outpaint.example: Replace a building's facade (inpaint), then extend to show more street context (outpaint)

style_then_inpaint.description: Apply artistic style, then add or modify specific elements
style_then_inpaint.example: Convert to watercolor style, then add painted flowers in specific areas

multi_region_inpainting.description: Modify multiple separate regions in a single operation
multi_region_inpainting.example: Change both the car and the building in different parts of the image

inpainting_quality: Ensure seamless blending with existing content
outpainting_quality: Ensure natural continuation of existing elements
style_transfer_quality: Balance style application with content preservation
Ensure style consistency across the entire image
Consider the appropriateness of style for content
